TopicTitle: Suggestion: text inputs navigable with tab key

Articles.Content:
I was just writing my campaign name and when I was happy with the name, my pinky was already at the tab key, and became an idiot for a few seconds until I noticed that it didn't brought the focus to the next field (agency name).

So... I think it would be a neat addition if fields were navigable by pressing the tab key. I understand that some fields won't be that easy to do, due even to visual cues about their focused state (checkboxes, toggles, radios...), but I guess it should be doable at least for text input fields.

I was attacked by the "pumping sim once" issue so I cannot test if the fields in-game share the same behaviour (or lack thereof here), but I guess they will.

Not a critical suggestion, but I think it would be a "nice to have if time allows" one.
